mapper.select:
SELECT , p.personal_name as personalName, p.mobile_phone_no as mobilePhoneNo from tb_ecom_member m, tb_user_inf u, tb_person_inf p where u.user_id = m.user_id and p.user_id = u.user_id and m.data_stat = '0' and p.data_stat = '0'
and p.personal_name like "%"#{personalName}"%"
and p.mobile_phone_no = #{mobilePhoneNo}
order by m.update_time desc
